        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">KS2 Literacy Y3 Reading Myths</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">KS2 Lesemythen Des Bildungsgrad-Y3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">KS2 Mythes de Lecture de l'Instruction Y3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">KS2 Mitos Da Leitura Do Literacy Y3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">KS2 Miti Della Lettura Di Literacy Y3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">KS2 μύθοι ανάγνωσης βασικής εκπαίδευσης Y3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">KS2 Mitos De la Lectura De la Instrucción Y3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Understanding the difference between legend and myths, Reading text then checking comprehension.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">myths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">legend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Den Unterschied zwischen der Legende und Mythen 
verstehen, den Text lesend, der dann Erfassen überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arrangement la différence entre la légende et 
les mythes, lisant le texte contrôlant alors la compréhension.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreendendo a diferença entre a legenda e os 
mitos, lendo o texto que verifica então a compreensão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capendo la differenza fra la leggenda ed i miti, 
leggenti testo allora che controlla comprensione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλαβαίνοντας τη διαφορά μεταξύ του μύθου και των 
μύθων, που διαβάζουν το κείμενο που ελέγχει έπειτα την 
κατανόηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entendiendo la diferencia entre la leyenda y los 
mitos, leyendo el texto entonces que controla la comprensión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mythen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Legende</string>
          </keyword>
